alert.note: Alert for Pickens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 14 at 3:34AM EST until January 17 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches with amounts up to 5 inches at elevations above 2000 feet. Ice accumulations of around a tenth of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Pickens County. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the heavy snow and ice. Travel could be nearly impossible.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is a potential for significant snow, sleet, or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts. Additional details can be found at weather.gov/Atlanta.
